item.title: Nationwide recall alert: ADHD drug may not dissolve correctly
item.description: Millions of Americans who rely on medication for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) may be affected by a new drug recall.

item.title: Toxic beauty: Health risks of Latin America's cosmetics trade
item.description: Across Latin America's cities, a lucrative informal trade in cosmetics and personal hygiene products is thriving.
